channel.title: Server Status page [w/ Source Code]
channel.description:
Currently it supports 317 and 508, what other versions do you use and what do you want it to support? If possible when you post a version, link to a server for that version so that I can support it easier.
Thanks.
edit: Also post general comments about the new serverstatus page here, what features do you want added or changed etc?
F.A.Q:
Q: When will my server be removed from the status page?
A: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.msg2967383.html#msg2967383]Your server will be deleted from status page after it's uptime drops below 40 percent.[/url]
Q: My server fell below 100% uptime, can someone remove it from the list for me?
A: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.msg2938139.html#msg2938139]Moparisthebest is the only one that can, no other staff has access to it, but he will not remove your server from the status page. Don't PM him about it. No exceptions.[/url]
Q: My server fell below 100% uptime, can it ever go back up to 100%?
A: Yes, it [i]can[/i], but only because it rounds the percentage off. So once your server gets above 99.5% it will round it up and appear as 100%.
Q: Will a "remove server" button be added to the status page?
A: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.msg2780861.html#msg2780861]No, this will never happen.[/url]
Q: How often is my server checked?
A: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.msg2958908.html#msg2958908]About every 30 minutes.[/url]
Q: Your page shows my server as offline, when it is actually online because me and my friends are on it.
A: Just because your server is online for you or your friends, doesn't mean it is online for my server or others. There could be network congestion between our two servers, or even a break in the internet that hasn't been routed around yet. Also my script must check sometimes 1000+ servers every 30 minutes, so it can't spend valuable time waiting for a response from you, if you don't respond in the given time it marks you as offline.
[hr]
I am now also releasing the full source code to the server status page to the public with two hopes: 1. It will be useful to someone. 2. Development speed will pick up because others can now help me, and submit pull requests with github, or give me patches.
Grab it here: https://github.com/moparisthebest/Server-Status-Page
And of course, any and all comments are welcome!

item.title: Server Status page [w/ Source Code]
item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1657, topic:275446”]Just pushed an update to the server status page, you shouldn’t really notice anything different. Please do tell me right away if anything broke.

Edit: new update script is up and running, this is what approves servers and checks current uptime. It will run faster than before (virtually guaranteed to check all new servers in 5 minutes, and check all existing ones in 10), and gives a better timeout to account for network latency issues (8 seconds instead of the old 2). Code for that is on github as well.[/quote]

I decided to give it a go to see if I could improve or add on to this at all, I have compiled the StatusChecker package, but I am curious on how to use it exactly. You didn’t really provide any docs on how it works anywhere that I can see. A simple PM of how to “get it running” would be really nice!

If anyone else knows how to do it, can you just give a point in the right direction.

Thanks,
Supaz

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @WorldWidePK WorldWidePK
item.description:
@WorldWidePK wrote:

Added my server yesterday. Yet to be posted. I miss the old moparscape. It’s dumb that the status page has been on beta since like 2012. Also there are multiple posts for — Pernix RSPS - V2 —. Love how Pernix has 9+ posts for his server and I have to wait longer than 24 hours just to get mine posted. Get on top of your game Mopar.

No disrespect for Mopar, but this is just pissing me off.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status page [w/ Source Code]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:1678, topic:275446”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=363862.msg4386619#msg4386619 date=1385827053]

I’ve recently changed the host for my server, and unfortunately did not set the server IP of the server status to a no-ip.
Is there a way that I can change the ip address?
[/quote]you need to ask to delete your previous advertisement and create a whole new advertisement so copy everything from there to nottepad etc

Moparisthebest does not delete any servers from the status page. You’ll need to wait until your uptime drops below 40% in order for that advertisement to be automatically removed.

I believe one was thinking of the Server Status Page, and the other was thinking of the Server Advertisements baord[/quote]Also i was thinking bout the server status page

Read full topic

I’ve recently changed the host for my server, and unfortunately did not set the server IP of the server status to a no-ip.
Is there a way that I can change the ip address?
[/quote]you need to ask to delete your previous advertisement and create a whole new advertisement so copy everything from there to nottepad etc[/quote]
Moparisthebest does not delete any servers from the status page. You’ll need to wait until your uptime drops below 40% in order for that advertisement to be automatically removed.

item.title: Server Status page [w/ Source Code]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

deathschaos9 suggested detecting the HTTP protocol to stop cheating where people say their server port is 80 and it’s really an HTTP server. I went ahead and implemented some rudimentary detection of other simple and common protocols too, so no one can cheat like this anymore.

This won’t affect a lot of servers, currently only 16 use port number 80.

Read full topic
